name: The Forest of Conx
description:
The Forest of Conx is a survival horror tower defense game, where you have came to a forest to find a mysterious creature named "Conx", unfortunately, this task isn't as easy as once planned..



Features in The Forest of Conx:
-Exploration
The vast forest provides lots of environments to explore

-foraging
Before night hits you must collect a descent amount of globs, these globs will allow you to buy towers to defend yourself

-Upgrades
The makeshift cabin you hunker in has many uninstalled upgrades that you can use to better your chances of survival

-Progressive Difficulty
The difficult of enemies increases as the days go by, make sure to not overstay your welcome in the woods..

-Towers
There are many Towers you can buy and place around your cabin, these towers will defend you from creatures once night hits..

-Challenge and Freeplay Modes
Even after you complete the main story, there are still more things to do! Such as mods, the level editor, challenge mode, or the freeplay menu.



Some other things to keep in mind:

-Your cabin has a limited power supply, make sure to recharge power via the fusebox outside.

-There's a large cave system underneath the forest, make sure to explore these tunnels thoroughly

-Be aware of flash floods and other disasters!

-Beware Conx...
